oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena

Class SGDBHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena.SGDBHandler

  • public class SGDBHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all Database related activities for SPARQL Gateway.

        public static void deleteSparqlQuery(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                     int qid)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Delete a SPARQL query from ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_QUERY table. Note that if delete is successful, then a commit will be executed.
        Parameters:
        conn - database connection
        qid - ID of the SPARQL query to be deleted.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteSparqlQuery

        public static void deleteSparqlQuery(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                     int qid,
                                     boolean commit)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Delete a SPARQL query from ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_QUERY table. A commit will be executed if the delete is successful and commit flag is set to true.
        Parameters:
        conn - database connection
        qid - ID of the SPARQL query to be deleted.
        commit - changes will be persisted if set to true.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getSignature

        public static java.lang.String getSignature(java.lang.String s)
        This method returns a signature that is used to populate the SIG column of ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_XSLT and ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_QUERY tables.

      • getSparqlQuery

        public static void getSparqlQuery(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                  int qid,
                                  java.lang.StringBuilder sbQuery,
                                  java.lang.StringBuilder sbDesc)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get a SPARQL query from the ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_QUERY table.
        Parameters:
        qid - the SPARQL query ID.
        sbQuery - MUST not be null. Its content will be replaced by the SPARQL query retrieved.
        sbDesc - MUST not be null. Its content will be replaced by the SPARQL query description retrieved.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getSparqlQueryMetadata

        public static java.util.Collection<oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena.SGDBHandler.MetadataEntry> getSparqlQueryMetadata(java.sql.Connection conn)
                                                                                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a collection of all SPARQL query metadata currently stored in the ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_QUERY table. This metadata includes the query IDs and descriptions. This method returns the metadata in no particular order.

        Note that this method does not return the full text of the SPARQL queries.

        Parameters:
        conn - database connection
        Returns:
        query ID and description for all the SPARQL queries stored in the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getSparqlQueryMetadataInWindow

        public static java.util.Collection<oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena.SGDBHandler.MetadataEntry> getSparqlQueryMetadataInWindow(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                                                                                            int windowSize,
                                                                                                                            int centerId)
                                                                                                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a collection of SPARQL query metadata currently stored in the ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_QUERY table with IDs centered around the given id, centerId. This metadata includes the query IDs and descriptions. This method returns the metadata in no particular order.

        Note that this method does not return the full text of the SPARQL queries.

        Note that in boundary cases (e.g. the center ID is near the beginning or end of the list of IDs) then this method may return less than windowSize results.

        Parameters:
        conn - database connection
        windowSize - number of desired results to fetch
        centerId - ID of query that should be in center of results
        Returns:
        query ID and description for all the SPARQL queries stored in the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getXslt

        public static void getXslt(java.sql.Connection conn,
                           int xid,
                           java.lang.StringBuilder sbXSLT,
                           java.lang.StringBuilder sbDesc)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get a XSLT from the ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_XSLT table.
        Parameters:
        xid - the XSLT ID.
        sbXSLT - MUST not be null. Its content will be replaced by the XSLT retrieved.
        sbDesc - MUST not be null. Its content will be replaced by the XSLT description retrieved.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getXsltMetadata

        public static java.util.Collection<oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena.SGDBHandler.MetadataEntry> getXsltMetadata(java.sql.Connection conn)
                                                                                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a collection of all XSLT transformation metadata currently stored in the ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_XSLT table. This metadata includes the transformation IDs and descriptions. This method returns the metadata in no particular order.

        Note that this method does not return the full text of the XSLT tranformations.

        Parameters:
        conn - database connection
        Returns:
        transformation Id and description for all the XSLT tranformations stored in the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getXsltMetadataInWindow

        public static java.util.Collection<oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena.SGDBHandler.MetadataEntry> getXsltMetadataInWindow(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                                                                                     int windowSize,
                                                                                                                     int centerId)
                                                                                                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a collection of all XSLT transformation metadata currently stored in the ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_XSLT table with IDs centered around the given id, centerId. This metadata includes the transformation IDs and descriptions. This method returns the metadata in no particular order.

        Note that this method does not return the full text of the XSLT tranformations.

        Note that in boundary cases (e.g. the center ID is near the beginning or end of the list of IDs) then this method may return less than windowSize results.

        Parameters:
        conn - database connection
        windowSize - number of desired results to fetch
        centerId - ID of transformation that should be in center of results
        Returns:
        transformation Id and description for all the XSLT tranformations stored in the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • init

        public void init()
          throws java.sql.SQLException,
                 java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                 java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                 javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
        This method initializes metadata in the underlying schema. Note that if the data source OracleSGDS is not configured or there is no available DB connection, then this method does nothing.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException

      • insertSparqlQuery

        public static void insertSparqlQuery(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                     int qid,
                                     java.lang.String s,
                                     java.lang.String desc,
                                     boolean ignoreDup)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                     org.apache.jena.query.QueryException
        Insert a SPARQL query into ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_QUERY table. Note that if the insert is successful, then a commit will be executed. Before anything, the SPARQL query will be syntax checked.
        Parameters:
        conn - database connection
        qid - an integer query id
        s - SPARQL query body
        desc - a short description for the SPARQL query
        ignoreDup - ignores a unique key violation during insert when set to true
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        org.apache.jena.query.QueryException

      • insertSparqlQuery

        public static void insertSparqlQuery(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                     int qid,
                                     java.lang.String s,
                                     java.lang.String desc,
                                     boolean ignoreDup,
                                     boolean commit)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                     org.apache.jena.query.QueryException
        Insert a SPARQL query into ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_QUERY table. A commit will be executed if the insert is successful and commit flag is set to true. Before anything, the SPARQL query will be syntax checked.
        Parameters:
        conn - database connection
        qid - an integer query id
        s - SPARQL query body
        desc - a short description for the SPARQL query
        ignoreDup - ignores a unique key violation during insert when set to true
        commit - if true, then the changes will be persisted
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        org.apache.jena.query.QueryException

      • insertXslt

        public static void insertXslt(java.sql.Connection conn,
                              int xid,
                              java.lang.String s,
                              java.lang.String desc,
                              boolean ignoreDup)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                              javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
        Insert an XSLT into ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_XSLT table. Note that if the insert is successful, then a commit will be executed. Before anything, the XSLT provided will be syntax checked.
        Parameters:
        conn - database connection
        xid - an XSLT id
        s - the XSLT body
        desc - a short description for the XSLT
        ignoreDup - ignores a unique key violation during insert when set to true
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException

      • insertXslt

        public static void insertXslt(java.sql.Connection conn,
                              int xid,
                              java.lang.String s,
                              java.lang.String desc,
                              boolean ignoreDup,
                              boolean commit)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                              javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
        Insert an XSLT into ORACLE_ORARDF_SG_XSLT table. A commit will be executed if the insert is successful and commit flag is set to true. Before anything, the XSLT provided will be syntax checked.
        Parameters:
        conn - database connection
        xid - an XSLT id
        s - the XSLT body
        desc - a short description for the XSLT
        ignoreDup - ignores a unique key violation during insert when set to true
        commit - if true, then the changes will be persisted
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
